abstract: In the first sizable layoffs in its history, Google is cutting about a quarter of the American operations of DoubleClick, the advertising technology company that it acquired recently.
snippet: In the first sizable layoffs in its history, Google is cutting about a quarter of the American operations of DoubleClick, the advertising technology company that it acquired recently.
lead_paragraph: In the first sizable layoffs in its history, Google is cutting about 300 jobs from the American operations of DoubleClick, the advertising technology company that it acquired recently, according to a person with direct knowledge of Google’s plans.

headline.main: Google to Lay Off About 300 at DoubleClick

abstract: Douglas Merrill, a vice president of engineering at Google, is leaving the Internet search company to become a president of digital at EMI Music.
snippet: Douglas Merrill, a vice president of engineering at Google, is leaving the Internet search company to become a president of digital at EMI Music.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Douglas Merrill, a vice president of engineering at Google, is leaving the Internet search company to become a president of digital at EMI Music, the recorded music division of EMI Group, according to an executive briefed on his move.

abstract: Shares of online travel agency Expedia were up more than 9 percent in afternoon trade on Tuesday amid speculation that the company could be a takeover target for Google.
lead_paragraph: Shares of online travel agency Expedia were up more than 9 percent in afternoon trade on Tuesday amid speculation that the company could be a takeover target for Google.
